title: Who do I request for a MOI( Medium Of Instruction) certificate?
content:
Hello all, I am a 2023 graduate currently applying to universities abroad and need assistance in obtaining a Medium of Instruction (MOI) certificate. If anyone has previously requested an MOI or knows the appropriate department or person to contact for this, I would greatly appreciate your guidance.

Thank you in advance for your help.

comments.body:
Search this subreddit, someone posted about this just last week. 

The medium of instruction is mentioned on your transcript.
There's also a discord server with PES kids who are pursuing/have pursued MS. Let me know if you'd like to join
DM me. Can't share an open server link publicly.
